content:
Adding sautéed onions and bell peppers will definitely elevate the flavor and nutritional profile of your Spaghetti Aglio e Olio. The sweetness of the bell peppers will complement the tanginess of the tomatoes perfectly, and the onions will add a depth of flavor. It's a great way to add some extra veggies to your meal without overpowering the dish.

And yay for saving money on your grocery bill! That 20% off coupon was a great score, and stocking up on canned tomatoes was a smart move. Canned tomatoes are a pantry staple that can be used in so many different recipes, so you'll be able to enjoy the benefits of your savings for a while.

Remember, cooking with coupons and sales is all about being intentional with your shopping and meal planning. By planning your meals around the ingredients you have on hand and the sales you can find, you can save money without sacrificing flavor or nutrition. Keep up the good work, and happy cooking!

If you have any other questions or need more recipe ideas, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. And don't forget to enjoy your delicious Spaghetti Aglio e Olio with sautéed onions and bell peppers!
